titleInfo.title: Brought to the Second Municipality Police Prison.

mods.abstract: BROUGHT to the Second Municipality Police Prison--LOUISE, a light griffe, about 24 years old, 5 feet 1 inch high; says she belongs to Mr. Laguayster. BAPTISTE, a griff, about 37 years old, 5 feet 6 inches high; says he belongs to Mr. Casnelle. WILLIAM JONES, a griff, about 19 years old, 5 feet 5 inches high; says he is free; supposed to be a slave. CYRUS, a dark griff, about 29 years old, 5 feet 4 1/2 inches high; says he belongs to Wm. Smith. JULIAN, a light griff, about 11 years old, 4 feet 4 inches high; says he belongs to Mr. Mace. ANDREW, a griff, about 45 years old, 5 feet 2 inches high; says he belongs to Mr. Bienvenue. The owners will please comply with the law and take them away. J. WORRELL, Warden. New Orleans, May 20, 1851. my20 1aw3w
mods.note: Mr. Laguayster; Mr. Casnelle; Wm. Smith; Mr. Mace; Mr. Bienvenue
Louise (24); Baptiste (37); William Jones (19); Cyrus (29); Julian (11); Andrew (45)
Louisiana State University Libraries, Special Collections ( http://www.lib.lsu.edu/special )
mods.accessCondition: E-mail lsudiglib@lsu.edu with questions or comments about the collection.

Physical rights are retained by the LSU Libraries. Copyright has expired and the item is therefore in the public domain. Permission to reproduce this image must be requested through the Special Collections Department, Louisiana State University Libraries.
mods.note: Louisiana Runaway Slave Advertisements, 1836-1865, Louisiana Digital Library, Baton Rouge, La.
